# error

**Instance Property**

An object the describes the error that caused the rendering failure.

## Declaration

```swift
var error: (any Error)? { get }
```

## Discussion

This value is `nil` by default. It only contains a valid error object when the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVSampleBufferVideoRenderer/status] value is [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVQueuedSampleBufferRenderingStatus/failed].

## Inspecting the status

- **status**: A status value that indicates whether this object can enqueue and render sample buffers.
